content: TE-C-HDA-ST Setting tool Setting tool – required for installation of HDA undercut anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Setting tools and accessories ### FEATURES:Features Essential for activating the self-undercutting feature of HDA undercut anchors Industry-standard SDS Plus (TE-C) connection end Available in multiple versions, each sized to match specific anchor diameters, helping to remove opportunities for installation error Applications Automatic self-undercutting operation for installation of HDA undercut anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 331843 - Setting tool HDA M10 w/TE-C connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST20-M10/C Setting tool - 331844 - Setting tool HDA M12 w/TE-C connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST22-M12/C Setting tool
